100.text:
Please find a comfortable sitting or lying
position for you and relax. Put one hand on

112.text:
the center of the chest in the area of thymus
gland, where are also located your heart and

125.text:
the center of your soul. Put your other hand
below your first hand, down to the area of

135.text:
the ribs on the left side, just below the
chest, where the energy of your soul is active.

148.text:
Now channel the energy, and get completely
comfortable.

160.text:
Now imagine yourself in front of the Archangel
Rafail, surrounded by a green light to sit

172.text:
right in front of you. With your thoughts
ask Rafail to take you up to the level of

182.text:
the Creator, the level of Divine Love, where
you will be able to contact your soul.

198.text:
See with your inner vision how golden light
ball emerges from the chest of the Archangel,

207.text:
and slowly floats and stops in the space between
you and the Archangel.

219.text:
The ball is growing, and growing and its light 
covers you and Archangel.

230.text: Now you can see that you and Archangel are placed together in a golden light ball.

242.text: Archangel Rafail is moving his hands towards you, and you lay your palms on his.

253.text: Now you are holding hands of the Archangel and you know that you are beginning your trip.

267.text:
Now, looking at the Archangel you will perform
together with him three deep breaths and with

276.text:
each breath in you will climb upper to the sky
and so easy and simple will get to the seventh

288.text:
level, the level of the Creator. You will
find yourself in the heart of God.

304.text:
Relax and watch right in the Archangel standing
in front of you. Feel that you are safe and

316.text:
taken care of within the beautiful energy
of the ball. Hold hands with Archangel Rafail.

334.text:
Now make a deep breath in and began to become
aware of your lifting up.

343.text: You are already in the infinite space of the Universe. Exhale now.

355.text:
Repeat breath in once again more slowly and
be aware you are now higher and higher every moment.

368.text:
Exhale.
Breathe in again, for the third time,

376.text:
looking at the Archangel and exhale. You are now in
the field of Divine love, in the field of Creator.

392.text:
All around you is a pure white light
with a slight blue sky. Stop here.

408.text:
Establish normal breathing rhythm. Feel on
every inch of your skin and feel inside you,

420.text:
a clean white light and energy of Unconditional
love. Breathe in this white light and recharge

436.text:
with it your body, your well-being. 
You are all alone in this beautiful field of pure energy

448.text:
and you feel wonderful, like being
at home, where you are always welcome and

458.text:
where you are unconditionally loved and accepted,
where your every request will be answered.

469.text:
Archangel Rafail and energy ball now disappeared,
while you enjoy the new environment.

481.text:
Now you feel completely safe and calm. You feel the
quiet joy that is slowly spreading throughout your being.

544.text:
You are surrounded by pure white light with
a slight blue sky.

550.text: Now you are breading into your lungs a Divine light and charge your body, charge your well-being,

562.text: recharge yourself with energy of Unconditional love. Charge yourself with well-being of every kind.

580.text:
Tell yourself in your mind: God please, move
into my heart unconditional love right now.

592.text:
You feel how gently clean white energy, with
blue glow, flows into your chest and begins

604.text:
its eternal circulation. In your chest it
creates a pleasant vortex and continues its

616.text:
eternal movement.
Energy is changing its color from white to

624.text:
pink and embroidered with the finest gold
particles and you can now clearly feel her

634.text:
warmth and harmonizing force that's running
throughout your being.

701.text:
Now speak softly, so that you can hear yourself,
while staying in a state of complete peace,

711.text:
the following request:
Father, Mother, God, Goddess, Creator of all that is.

730.text:
In the name of what I am, that what
I am, I (now tell your name) am asking you

743.text:
to please connect me with my soul, and let
me understand all her needs for care, poverty

752.text:
and powerlessness. With gratitude for everything
I obtained, let out from me anything that does

765.text:
not serve my development and let it be
sent to the Holy Well.

775.text: Please release from me all obligations, beliefs, pledges, oaths of my parents, ancestors and my spiritual

789.text:
family regarding poverty, denial, helplessness,
which are part of me and that do not serve

800.text:
the supreme development of my soul and send
them to the Holy Well. I am asking for blessing

812.text:
from the God, ancestors, parents, and my spiritual
family for the abundance of love, light, bliss,

827.text:
health, and material wealth. I ask to connect
the energy of my soul with the energy of abundance.

842.text: From now on, and forever, and at the same time I can progress spiritually

850.text: and get closer to God and Divine Love. THANK YOU Creator for this day and time (say day, month, year,

864.text:
hours and minutes).
IT IS DONE.  IT IS DONE.  IT IS DONE.

879.text:
You're still in the field of Divine love,
at the level of the Creator, surrounded by

895.text:
Now intentionally ask Archangel Rafail to
appear and to guide you down to the physical level.

907.text:
Now you are back in the golden energy
ball, along with Archangel Rafail.

916.text:
Now you will do three times inhalation and
exhalation, which will bring you back to the

923.text:
physical level. Breathe in slowly and deeply
and while exhale please see with your inner

934.text:
vision how you are getting back to Earth in
golden ball, together with the Archangel Rafail.

946.text:
Inhale again and breathe out. During exhalation
feel how you are going lower and lower.

961.text:
Now do one more deep breath in and while keeping
the focus on the exhale,

968.text:
feel that you are back to the Earth.
Now you are back to the physical world, firmly

978.text:
grounded. With your inner vision see how the
golden ball you were flying with,

986.text:
becomes smaller and smaller. See how it stops in the
space between you and Archangel Rafail and

998.text:
returns to the center of the Archangel Rafail chest. 
Express your gratitude to the Archangel.

1012.text:
Make a deep breath in that awakens you completely.
Now you can open your eyes.
